[01:15.77]Ooooo

[01:34.28]Ooooo
[01:35.03]Rattlesnake said to the copperhead
[01:37.31]You give us vipers a real bad name
[01:39.86]You prey on the weakest
[01:41.38]You fight for no reason
[01:42.87]No wonder we get blamed
[01:45.11]Ooo
[01:45.47]Copperhead laughed
[01:46.44]Said kiss my a*s
[01:47.85]You can bark but there ain't much bite
[01:50.79]You rattle that tail
[01:51.95]But it's fear I smell
[01:53.46]I think you're shaking out of fright
[01:55.84]Rattlesnake
[01:56.98]Copperhead
[01:58.48]Either one of them'll kill you dead
[02:01.14]We stay hungry
[02:02.49]They get fed
[02:04.11]Don't pass the plate around
[02:06.51]Lie by lie
[02:07.84]Cheat by cheat
[02:09.26]Venom in smiling teeth
[02:11.87]They just run those forked tongues
[02:14.90]And the whole world's burning down
[02:17.44]Ooooo aw
[02:18.94]Ooooo

[02:21.22]Ooooo
[02:22.67]Ooooo aw
[02:24.02]Ooooo
[02:28.09]Ooooo
[02:28.60]Copperhead said to the rattlesnake
[02:31.16]If you ever wanna make it rain
[02:33.89]We could team up
[02:34.85]Be twice as tough
[02:36.61]Fear will be our game
[02:39.24]Rattlesnake said to the copperhead
[02:41.79]You know we were the original sin
[02:44.41]And I bet you my rattle against your copper
[02:47.12]That the b***h takes the apple again
[02:49.80]Rattlesnake
[02:51.04]Copperhead
[02:52.30]Either one of them'll kill you dead
[02:55.16]We stay hungry
[02:56.42]They get fed
[02:57.89]And don't pass the plate around
[03:00.48]Lie by lie cheat by cheat
